about_the_game:
Where are you, Cinderella? is a visual novel taking place in Vietnam.
Discover Vietnamese culture and the world of entertainment with this new tale of Cinderella!



On the one hand, we have Tam, a quiet and reserved Vietnamese girl who is cherished by her family. On the other hand, we have her brother Alberto, a smiling and nice Italian boy who has little confidence in himself.

While they seemed to be inseparable since they met, fate had other plans. During a trip to Vietnam, they lost sight of each other. Their only clue to finding each other is a poor shoe left on the road and their dreams to become celebrities.

What if... all they have to do is to shine on stage? What if... all they have to do is to fulfill their dreams? So they will be able to see the light that will guide them to find each other



You'll have the pleasure of meeting and chatting with many curious characters.





  • The routes are interconnected: the choices made in one protagonist's route influence the other one.
  • References and explanations relating to Vietnamese culture, as well as small cultural references to other Asian countries (China, South Korea, Japan...) and the world of entertainment, will also be included!
  • A sweet and colorful universe awaits you.
detailed_description:
Where are you, Cinderella? is a visual novel taking place in Vietnam.
Discover Vietnamese culture and the world of entertainment with this new tale of Cinderella!



On the one hand, we have Tam, a quiet and reserved Vietnamese girl who is cherished by her family. On the other hand, we have her brother Alberto, a smiling and nice Italian boy who has little confidence in himself.

While they seemed to be inseparable since they met, fate had other plans. During a trip to Vietnam, they lost sight of each other. Their only clue to finding each other is a poor shoe left on the road and their dreams to become celebrities.

What if... all they have to do is to shine on stage? What if... all they have to do is to fulfill their dreams? So they will be able to see the light that will guide them to find each other



You'll have the pleasure of meeting and chatting with many curious characters.





  • The routes are interconnected: the choices made in one protagonist's route influence the other one.
  • References and explanations relating to Vietnamese culture, as well as small cultural references to other Asian countries (China, South Korea, Japan...) and the world of entertainment, will also be included!
  • A sweet and colorful universe awaits you.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Where are you, Cinderella?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Discover Vietnamese culture and the world of entertainment with this new tale of Cinderella! Play as Tam, a young actress who is looking for her Prince Charming or Alberto, a famous singer in search of his Cinderella! Will you be able to find the lost shoe’s owner? Or, will you find your shoe?
